mapper.select: SELECT LIST_NM, CARD_NO, CARD_NM, TO_CHAR(LIST_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LIST_START_DT, TO_CHAR(LIST_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LIST_END_DT, LIST_TCOLOR, LIST_BGCOLOR, LIST_BDCOLOR, WORK_NO, WORK_NM, LIST_NO FROM LIST JOIN CARD USING(CARD_NO) JOIN WORKSPACE USING(WORK_NO) WHERE LIST_START_DT BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(to_date(#{startDate}, 'RRRR-MM'), -1) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(to_date(#{startDate}, 'RRRR-MM'), 1)) AND LIST_NO IN(SELECT LIST_NO FROM LIST WHERE CARD_NO IN (SELECT CARD_NO FROM CARD WHERE WORK_NO IN (SELECT WORK_NO FROM WORKSPACE_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ) AND CARD_STATUS = 'Y') AND LIST_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT WORK_NO FROM WORKSPACE_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT LIST_NM, CARD_NO, CARD_NM, TO_CHAR(LIST_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LIST_START_DT, TO_CHAR(LIST_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LIST_END_DT, LIST_TCOLOR, LIST_BGCOLOR, LIST_BDCOLOR, WORK_NO, WORK_NM, LIST_NO FROM LIST JOIN CARD USING(CARD_NO) JOIN WORKSPACE USING(WORK_NO) WHERE LIST_START_DT BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(to_date(#{startDate}, 'RRRR-MM'), -1) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(to_date(#{startDate}, 'RRRR-MM'), 1)) AND LIST_NO IN(SELECT LIST_NO FROM LIST WHERE CARD_NO IN (SELECT CARD_NO FROM CARD WHERE WORK_NO IN (SELECT WORK_NO FROM WORKSPACE_JOIN WHERE WORK_NO = #{workNo} ) AND CARD_STATUS = 'Y') AND LIST_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM FROM WORKSPACE_JOIN NATURAL JOIN MEMBER WHERE WORK_NO = #{workNo} AND MEMBER_STATUS='Y'
